name: Betcy - Bet a Macy
description: An amazon Alexa skill to create a trackable bet using Macy's product as a wager. The project enables you to easily create a smart contract for a bet between 2 parties with a stake. The bet and the wager (that can be a product from Macy's) will get deployed on the Ethereum blockchain. Using Betcy's Alexa skill to create a smart contract using just your voice is the most convenient way to create a smart contract.
tech_stack: Node.js, AWS Lambda, Python, Solidity, Ethereum Framework
